overview: We take you back to the roots of the southern rockers that bought you Sweet Home Alabama and Free Bird, exploring the factors that helped create some of the best loved music of all time. From riding high on their burgeoning success, to the disastrous plane crash that nearly ended the band, this is a fascinating story waiting to be told. 30 years on from that terrible tragedy, join us on the ultimate exploration of the life and continuing legacy of Lynyrd Skynyrd!
tagline: "If I leave here tomorrow, would you still remember me?" Freebird
title: Lynyrd Skynyrd: Rock Case Studies
